channel.title: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!
channel.description:
Hey guys well i just started to play League of Legends and i'am gonna be livestreaming for a bit and looking for people to give me a couple of tips and tricks aswell so check out my livestream here :)
http://www.twitch.tv/newbynexer

item.title: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Out of interest, which server do you play on?

And Miss Silabsoft I do but I figured he should get used to actually using his keyboard first before using smartcast

Read full topic
item.source: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!

item.title: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

ytuio9`:

you can activate your skills by using Q,W,E and R instead of actually clicking on the button to activate the range indicator?

Not using smartcast?

Read full topic
item.source: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!

item.title: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You should livestream with Classic

I’d watch.

item.source: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!

item.title: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

at 9:15 did you actually shoot out your E on the ryze? Did you do that on purpose or was that accidental? Also, did you know you can activate your skills by using Q,W,E and R instead of actually clicking on the button to activate the range indicator?

Edit: I recommend you read a guide such as this one (some of the advice in it is a bit outdated but it works) or watch professional streams at the official streamer portal.

Read full topic
item.source: Started to play League of Legends Livestreaming!
